name: Establish Command
text: *weep* My creators are gone. Succumbed to radiation poisoning. Claimed by the Cataclysm. *weep* But I remain. Entrusted with their last great task. To create a new society without the flaws of the old. A society run by machina. A society that can fix the damage caused by humans.

choices.text: *meeep* So let my story begin. Let these lands flourish with new life. My life.
